title: APPROPRIATIONS – MILITARY DIVISION – DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND WELFARE – Relates to the appropriation to the Military Division and the Department of Health and Welfare for the Public Health Services Division for fiscal year 2026.
subject: APPROPRIATIONS
